code:
udf((InputArg: String, ErrorCode: String) => {
    var EndTime: Any = null
    var ErrorCode: Any = null
    var iNumWarnings: Any = null
    var StartTime: Any = null
    var iMaxNumber: Any = null
    var jobHandle: Any = null
    var iNumErrors: Any = null
    var sSummaryArray: Any = null
    ErrorCode = 0.0
    jobHandle = DSJ.ME
    iNumErrors = InputArg
    iMaxNumber = iNumErrors + 1.0
    StartTime = ds_string_concat(
      ds_string_concat(oconv(Config.DATE, "yyyy-MM-dd"), ""),
      oconv(Config.TIME, "MTS")
    )
    EndTime = ds_string_concat(
      ds_string_concat(oconv(date(), "yyyy-MM-dd"), ""),
      oconv(time(), "MTS")
    )
    sSummaryArray =
      dsgetlogsummary(jobHandle, DSJ.LOGWARNING, StartTime, EndTime, iMaxNumber)
    iNumWarnings = dcount(sSummaryArray, Config.FM)
    if (iNumWarnings > iNumErrors) {
      dslogfatal(
        ds_string_concat(
          ds_string_concat(
            ds_string_concat(iNumErrors, "warnings exceeded"),
            Config.FM
          ),
          sSummaryArray
        ),
        "rtAbortOnWarnings"
      )
     else {}
    null
  })
}
